createOrder.description: Swap market buy with posSide = long
Swap limit buy with stopPrice and posSide = long.
Swap limit sell with takeProfitPrice and posSide = long.
Swap limit sell with stopLossPrice and posSide = long.
Opening position with tp + sl attached (type 3)
Close an inverse swap position with a market reduceOnly order
Create a one-way-mode order with position side set to net
Create a swap postOnly limit order with tp + sl attached (type 3)
Spot market buy order with createMarketBuyOrderRequiresPrice set to false

createOrders.description: Create multiple spot orders at the same time
Create multiple swap orders at the same time

editOrder.description: Spot edit an orders price and amount
Swap edit an orders take profit price
Swap edit an orders take profit

fetchOpenOrders.description: Fetch open orders with no arguments

fetchCanceledOrders.description: Fetch canceled orders with no arguments

fetchClosedOrders.description: Fetch closed orders with no arguments

closePosition.description: Closing a short position in dual mode
closing a long position in dual mode

fetchMyTrades.description: Spot fetch my trades with no arguments
Spot fetch my trades with a defined symbol

fetchPositions.description: Fetch positions with a symbols argument

addMargin.description: Add margin to an inverse swap long position

reduceMargin.description: Reduce margin from an inverse swap long position

fetchOHLCV.description: fetchOHLCV using a timestamp that is 1439 candles in the past so that the history endpoint is used
fetchOHLCV using a timestamp that is 1438 candles in the past so that the current endpoint is used
fetchOHLCV.reason: relies on the current timestamp, which is not deterministic

createTriggerOrder.description: Swap create a stop order using the createTriggerOrder method (type 1)

createTakeProfitOrder.description: Swap create a take profit trigger order using the createTakeProfitOrder method (type 2)

createStopLossOrder.description: Swap create a stop loss trigger order using the createStopLossOrder method (type 2)

createOrderWithTakeProfitAndStopLoss.description: Swap create an order with a take profit and stop loss attached using the createOrderWithTakeProfitAndStopLoss method (type 3)
